item.title: Terra Luna Classic To Expedite Community-Owned Station Wallet Infrastructure, LUNC Jumps
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terra Luna Classic core developer Joint L1 Task Force (L1TF) submitted a proposal to create a community-owned wallet, which will be managed by the Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) community through governance. LUNC validator Happy Catty Crypto has submitted a similar proposal for voting to prioritize building wallet infrastructure and prevent privatization. Terra Luna Classic L1TF to Develop

The post Terra Luna Classic To Expedite Community-Owned Station Wallet Infrastructure, LUNC Jumps appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Shares This Bullish Sentiment on Crypto
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:

This statement came as part of Powell’s presentation of the Federal Reserve’s Semi-Annual Monetary Policy Report to the
